set -e ; export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 ; export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 ; export GIT_PREFIX=git@github.com ; export GIT_ACCOUNT_NAME=`echo ${GIT_REPO%????} | cut -d "/" -f 4` ; export CURRENT_VERSION=`cat metadata.rb| grep version|awk '{print $2}' | tr -d \"` ; export INCREMENTED_VERSION=`echo $CURRENT_VERSION | awk -F'[.]' '{print $1 "." $2 "." $3+1}'` ; export MVN_INTERNAL_REPO_URL=$MVN_REPO_URL/content/repositories/$MVN_REPO_ID
if [ -z "$ARTIFACT_ID" ] ; then export ARTIFACT_ID=`echo ${GIT_REPO%????} | cut -d "/" -f 5` ; fi
